ok I don't know why but I'm getting this random ideas for the server that are rlly cool.

Ok so I'm pretty sure that almost everyone knows wat /nick used to do on OCN, so I think that it would be pretty cool to have it on Avicus too for Medias and Staffs. Since I saw a post recently about staffs using Alts so they can play without anyone knowing that there is a staff playing, so this could make things easier so let's say there is a cheater that u are not sure about if he is hacking so u join the server and u can use /nick so now u have a random name or somehing so anyone can see the MOD prefix on ur name and shit like that it would be cool to have it.

BTW I know that my examples are rlly bad if u have another example for this suggestion put it in ^^
